1.name: Surge Enhancement

1.name: Mayhem
1.desc:
In Normal Mode, the Fury Meter remains at max and Burst turns into Mayhem Mode with the power of darkness. In Mayhem Mode, Atk. and Move Speed +<FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>5%</FONT>, Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>10%</FONT>, and the Fury Meter is not naturally consumed.
When in Mayhem Mode, all incoming Damage -<FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>72%</FONT>. HP is reduced to <FONT COLOR='#ff9999'>25%</FONT> of Max HP. This cannot be exceeded, even when healing is applied. Additionally, can only receive <FONT COLOR='#ff9999'>40%</FONT> of healing and <FONT COLOR='#ff9999'>25%</FONT> of shield.
Pressing the [<FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>X</FONT>] key will cancel Mayhem Mode, but you will be bound and unable to enter Mayhem Mode again for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>30s</FONT>.

1.name: Gravity Release
1.desc:
Hypergravity Zone Mode changes into <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>Gravity Release</FONT> Mode.
While in Gravity Release Mode, gain Push immunity and ability to use Skills. On Concentration Skill hit, Gravity Core can be recovered. However, Gravity Shield and Damage Reduction Effect do not apply. While in Gravity Release Skill Mode, Gravity Aura is maintained, and Penalty Gauge Reduction effects when hit by certain Boss or above monsters are also maintained. However, consuming Cores will not increase Gravity Meter.
Upon using the Gravity Release Skill in Normal Mode, gain <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'><$CALC <$TABLE_SKILLEFFECT ValueB 2180093/>/100/>%</FONT> of the Gravity Meter. In Gravity Release Mode, instantly recharge all Gravity Cores, and outgoing Damage +<FONT COLOR='#99ff99'><$CALC %1 <$TABLE_ABILITYFEATURE Value06 2180000 10 />/100 />%</FONT>. While in Gravity Release Mode, Gravity Release Skills inflict +<FONT COLOR='#99ff99'><$CALC %1 <$TABLE_ABILITYFEATURE Value03 2180000 10 />/100 />%</FONT> more Damage. When the Gravity Release Skill ends, Gravity Release Mode also ends.
